description: Built the company's website from the ground up, resulting in improved performance and enhanced SEO.
Enhanced codebase maintainability by fostering code reuse through the creation of a versatile UI library, which is now used by the company's website, blog, and learning management system (LMS).
Enhanced codebase quality by conducting code reviews.
Simplifying front-end project deployments through Dockerization.
Contributed to tech team management by providing mentorship to junior developers.
Skills: Typescript, React.js, Next.js, Docker, TailwindCss, Styled Components, Git
Improving the student experience through collaborative development of an LMS (Learning Management System) and website, achieved through continuous communication with the product team
Skills: Javascript, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Bootstrap, Git
Enhancing the experience for advertisers and ad publishers by collaboratively developing their panels through close communication with the product team.
Elevated code reusability by actively participating in the development of Yektanet's design system library (Yekta UI).
Skills: Javascript, Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Bootstrap, Git
Boosted the website's Lighthouse score by actively contributing to tasks like server-side rendering of various pages and implementing responsive image rendering.
Skills: Javascript, Flow.js, ReasonML, React.js, React-Native, Scala, Functional Programming, Git
Exploring diverse aspects of software development, including full-stack mobile application development, software architecture, and DevOps.
Skills: Java, Javascript, Docker, Git, React-Native
